review: The Fire Stick had promise, but falls short in many ways.  I'm almost tempted to give it two stars.First of all, I really thought it had an option to stream from any DLNA source, but it doesn't.  So, if you have videos on your computer you're hoping to watch via the Fire TV Stick, forget about it.  Furthermore, the device is just too Amazon-centric for my liking.  Sure, it's not hard to go to Netflix or Hulu, but on a number of occasions I've been fooled when I thought I was looking for content on one of the supported services.  Lastly, and most frustratingly, I have to reboot (the darn thing every couple of days or suffer through stuttering video playback.All in all, it's functional, but not outstanding in any way.
